The [[Resource|resource]] '''{{PAGENAME}}''' can be found in [[Quest|quests]] if the player is [[Level|level]] 40 or higher. It can also be crafted with [[Crafting (Skill)]] 3 or higher; available to [[Blacksmith|blacksmiths]] or other players through [[Master Shop|blacksmith's shops]]. It is used in crafting tier 3 :Bookblue: equipment.
